Package core.modAPI

Interface TileAttribute<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the new "field" for the Tile class
    public interface TileAttribute<T>
    Implementing this interface serves the same purpose as adding a field to the Tile class. I created this interface so that nobody would have to modify any core source code. This way, installing mods will never cause horrible conflicts.
    Author:
    clay

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • update

        void update​(double lastUpdateTime,
            double updateTime,
            Tile t,
            Board b)
        Called once per tic. This is the function where you want to update the value of this attribute (if you actually want to do that)
        Parameters:
        lastUpdateTime - the last time the simulation updated
        updateTime - the time of this current update
        t - the tile that this attribute belongs to
        b - the board that the tile t is a part of
